meanings.definition: To apply a new texture to something.
meanings.sent1: She retextured the walls in her room with a fresh coat of paint.
meanings.sent2: The artist retextured the canvas with bold brush strokes.
meanings.sent3: The decorator retextured the ceiling to give the room a modern look.
meanings.sent4: The chef retextured the sauce by adding a hint of spice.
meanings.sent5: The gardener retextured the soil to help the plants grow better.

meanings.definition: Having a new texture applied to it.
meanings.sent1: The retextured wall felt smooth to the touch.
meanings.sent2: The retextured fabric looked elegant and luxurious.
meanings.sent3: The retextured floor was a pleasant surprise for the guests.
meanings.sent4: The retextured skin of the fruit made it more appealing.
meanings.sent5: The retextured carpet added warmth to the room.
